messages.subject: limits of labels WAS  Re: special needs???
messages.msgSnippet: Here s a link to an article in New Yorker mag last summer that exemplifies local homeschooling families ability to support the uniqueness of their child(ren)
messages.messageBody:
Here's a link to an article in New Yorker mag last summer that exemplifies
local homeschooling families ability to support the uniqueness of their
child(ren) without ever getting caught in the trap of labels.

http://www.newyorker.com/archive/2006/07/24/060724ta_talk_owen

"Children with similar combinations of talents and apparent emotional
distance are often characterized by various clinical terms, which Elijahï¿½s
parents do not use, feeling that they limit rather than enlighten."

enjoy
Lisa Heyman
